name: Washing Machine

She is certified unfit for work for 6 months w.e.f. 15/10/2021. Client has just shifted to her new 1-room rental flat. Due to financial difficulties and limited financial resources, she is unable to afford the purchase of some household items and will benefit from donation. Client is unable to afford transportation fees.

name: Table fan
description: Client is a 65 year man living alone in a one-room HDB rental unit. He is not engaged in work due to his health conditions and dialysis thrice a week. He relies on comcare assistance every month to support his living. He shares that the unit he's staying in is warm as is closer to the ground, and would like to have a table fan. Thanks!

contact.name: Evelyn Tan

name: Standing Fan
description:
Our client is experiencing homelessness and was residing at a S3P shelter for the past 6-7 months. 
He has received his keys for his rental flat in Dec 2021. However, due to the financial situation (i.e. getting a new full-time job with the new housing stability), he would require support for basic household items to support his family's shift into the new rental flat.
Thank you.

name: Refrigerator
description: Client has 4 young children and 2 of them has mild special needs and other medical condition. Client's current's fridge is dripping water has been used for 8 years and was donated by someone else. Client would like to have a new fridge to store more frozen items and milk for her newborn baby.

Thus, having an air purifier will help her in keeping her environment clean. However, as she's financially needy, she is unable to afford it.

name: Small fridge

He requires a fridge as he does not have one, he will be able to store his rations and food in the fridge for his meals. Please contact me at 9728 1296. Thank you.

name: Washing machine

name: top load washing machine

Thank you very much for your kind donation.

Client’s spouse passed away early 2020.The family does not have their own home and were staying at open market rental, but due to financial struggle and caregiving needs by client, she applied for HDB public rental unit.HDB recently assigned a public rental unit to her, and she needs support with basic furnishing and electrical appliances. name: Adult Bicycle + 2x children bicycles with training wheels
description: Client is the sole breadwinner of her family, with 6 children, and is currently undergoing a divorce. She is front-line worker in a hospital, and has little time to spend with her children due to her job responsibilities. 4 of her children who are under 7 years old have voiced out that they want to learn cycling, and she would like to bring them out to learn cycling as a family bonding activity. She currently do not own any bicycles of her own, and hence would like to request for one adult bicycle of her own, and at least 2 children bicycle with training wheels for her children to share.

name: Resource Protein Liquid needed
description:
A low income patient is in need of supplements. She is a single lady, lives alone and unable to work. She is socially isolated and suffers from medical and mental health conditions and has difficulty preparing meals. She requires milk supplements for weight gain and nutrition due to her poor nutritional intake, as recommended by hospital dietician. The supplements would boost her overall health. We have explored other avenues of aid to no avail.

She requires 31 packets of Resource Protein Liquid (either Vanilla/Chocolate) per month for 3 months. (Total once off: 93)

If you are able to help, please help to deliver or cover delivery as well. Your kind assistance would greatly support this patient. Thank you in advance!
